frontmatter.title: Anticipate short notice changes
frontmatter.description: Expect shot-notice changes. Make contingency plans. Don't get stuck without a plan.

frontmatter.title: Move towards agreement
frontmatter.description: Identify points of agreement and move towards them. Be open-minded about points of contention.

frontmatter.title: Keep conversations moving
frontmatter.description: Move discussion forward. Make others aware of next steps. It's much harder to start a cold conversation than to keep a warm one going.

frontmatter.title: Silence is a reply
frontmatter.description: Silence is a reply, and it leaves much to infer.

frontmatter.title: Home is comfort not a place
frontmatter.description: Home is more than a place. It's a feeling of comfort and connection. Seek

frontmatter.title: Be diligent with healthy routines
frontmatter.description: Focus on consistency and quality will follow.

frontmatter.title: Reduce risk when unknowns persist
frontmatter.description: Conditions improve can only improve by reducing unknowns.

frontmatter.title: Develop habits with perpetual benefits
frontmatter.description: Great habits provide a continual chance for improvement.

frontmatter.title: Create own rules to safely proceed
frontmatter.description: Keep in mind what can be controlled. Create own rules as needed.

frontmatter.title: Harness technology for positive effects
frontmatter.description: New technology poses problems and creates opportunities. Find the ways to harness the best and filter out the bad.
